pages.name: Assets
pages.description:
An asset is something of value that you own or that belongs to you.
This service will help you to list your assets and their current value.

Note: You may be required to provide the court with proof of an asset and its value.

elements.name: assetTypes
elements.title: What kind of assets do you have?

choices.text: Real estate – property including land or buildings
Cash assets including cash and bank accounts (of any value)
Investments – Tax Free Savings Accounts (TFSA), Registered Retirement Savings Plans (RRSP), stocks and bonds, pensions or other investments
Loans and credit – money owing to me
Other including precious metals (gold etc.), art, jewellery, or other items of high value

pages.title: Assets
